Body:
Step

1

Select the collection, office size, and desired frequency to refresh your office decor.

Step

2

Based on your choices, we match you with a professional designer that will contact you to start customzing your space.

Step

3

Select your first shipment of ambiance features from our curated inventory to express your companies persona.

The Right Space, The Right Time

Obio designs the most innovative, trend-setting office spaces for the world’s most daring companies. We work with world-renown designers and interior decorators to create collections that reflect your business’s unique brand and personality.

Obio is all about making it simple for startups to design their office spaces in a way that saves you time without compromising on taste. Our designers are experts in their fields—with many having worked with startups before joining Obio.

We’re based out of Boston, the growing capital of the nation’s most successful startups. Obio is a startup designed for startups. So cancel that trip to your local Office Depot or Staples. You’re with Obio now. Make some space.
